is the Lymbus, the eternal waiting and the boredom as part of the
daily life of migrants: the impossibility of working  waiting
for the asylum status, for example, forced to a daily annihilation.
The
deprivation of possibility of “making” is another aspect we
wanted to highlight: we understood that many of migrant's riot
against the “Fortress Europe”, doesn't ask only for a paper, but
they claim the possibility of acting, “making” in order not to be
stuck for months, years without any possibility of changing their
situation.
In
fact, we met many forms of daily resistance, - on a small and wide
scale -, political self-organisation, attempts to speak in “first
person”, to claim rights, to find strategies and paths to get out
of the “Refugee” label and become finally a person.
In
this book we don't want to tell just “facts”. For us, it was very
important to share political ideas and discussions about
emancipation, future and imaginary with the women and men that we met
– not forcing them to a frontal interview about the past, the trip
or the tragic experience.
We
listened, talked, ate, drank, wrote and recorded; shared stories,
worked, walked together, drawn and ask them to draw memories, dreams
and desires.
We
told each other our life, but most of all we imagined together the
possibility of a better future, a world where the only stranger would
be discrimination and racism.ps. we support and share this Manifesto:  http://riserefugee.org/10-things-you-need-to-consider-if-you-are-an-artist-not-of-the-refugee-and-asylum-seeker-community-looking-to-work-with-our-community/







************************************************************************************************************************************************
Senza confini è il progetto di un libro – una "etnographicnovel" – scritto e disegnato, che nasce
dall’esigenza di raccontare storie del nomadismo contemporaneo. 

Francesca Cogni e Andrea
Staid dopo quasi dieci anni di lavoro si sono incontrati con i loro
due differenti approcci alla ricerca sociale. Una videomaker e
disegnatrice l’altro antropologo ed etnografo hanno cominciato a
dialogare ibridando i due approcci alla ricerca, ma soprattutto si
sono impegnati  per trovare un modo innovativo di restituire al
lettore l’esperienza del ricercatore e quella vissuta dai migranti
del nuovo millennio.

Vogliamo fare una
campagna di crowdfunding per restare indipendenti.
Con questa campagna di
crowdfounding vogliamo coprire i costi di produzione del lavoro
(materiali, viaggi, costi dei laboratori che stiamo facendo per la
ricerca, traduzioni...) e parte delle ore di lavoro di disegno e scrittura. 

Vogliamo poi cercare un
editore per il progetto, in modo da distribuirlo in circuiti diversi
da quelli già interessati al tema, sfruttando anche il potenziale
dato dall'uso del disegno, con una particolare attenzione ad
adolescenti e alle scuole.  Verranno organizzare presentazioni in
Italia e Germania.Il lavoro sarà
rilasciato con licenza Creative Commons.SENZA CONFINI:Un pittore congolese che
sogna l'Africa dalla periferia di Milano; un giornalista gambiano
rifugiato politico in Italia, attivista e fondatore del African
Refugees Union e reporter del movimento dei rifugiati a Berlino; un
militante turco scappato dal carcere e dalle torture di un governo
autoritario; un “rifugiato al quadrato” palestinese di famiglia,
siriano di nascita, berlinese per necessità; una rapper americana
nata a Buffalo, cresciuta in Florida, emigrata in California, poi in
Italia e ora a Berlino che con i suoi testi racconta i margini della
società occidentale; una ragazza rumena, che fa la volontaria in un
casa del rifugiato a Milano...

Una ragnatela di storie,
interconnessioni, incontri transnazionali dove la sola forma scritta
non sarebbe riuscita a renderne la complessità e la ricchezza. Per
questo abbiamo deciso di sperimentare una tipologia di racconto ampia
e polimorfa, che ibrida una scrittura etnografica con disegni, foto e
frame dell’esperienza vissuta in prima persona sul campo. 


Un impegno che ci siamo
posti come ricercatori è stato quello di provare a uscire dalle
categorie costruite dalle elités dominanti: migranti, rifugiati,
clandestini... 

Abbiamo voluto nel nostro
lavoro decostruire queste categorie perché crediamo che sia  una
importante tappa per comprendere che siamo tutti umani al di là
delle appartenenze e differenze culturali, etniche e biologiche.
In questa
“etnographicnovel”
c’è un importante focus sul fenomeno del  cosmopolitismo migrante,
ovvero di tutte quelle  lingue parlate dai migranti che non hanno
studiato in scuole ufficiali ma hanno appreso il loro saperi nella
scuola della strada.
Ci siamo concentrati
soprattutto su due città, Milano e Berlino, dove abbiamo riscontrato
similitudini e differenze, ma una cosa che ci ha colpito è lo stato
di limbo, l’attesa, l'incertezza, la noia come parte
integrante dell’esperienza di un migrante, l’impossibilità di
lavorare nell’attesa del permesso di soggiorno, per esempio, che
porta a uno stato di annichilimento giornaliero.
La privazione della sfera
del “fare” è un altro aspetto
importante da sottolineare: ci siamo resi conto che molte
delle lotte dei migranti scaturite dalla non accettazione della
legislazione della “fortezza Europa”, non rivendicano soltanto
una carta, un permesso, ma rivendicano la possibilità di agire, di
“fare” per non rimanere mesi, anni parcheggiati
nell’impossibilità di cambiare la propria situazione.
Abbiamo infatti incontrato
tante forme di resistenza quotidiana su piccola e grande scala,
auto-organizzazione politica, tentativi di raccontarsi in prima
persona, rivendicare i propri diritti, trovare strategie e percorsi
per uscire dall'etichetta di “rifugiato” e poter essere
finalmente una persona.

Il nostro lavoro non vuole
solo narrare i fatti, ci è sembrato importante condividere con le
donne e gli uomini incontrati racconti sulle possibilità politiche
di emancipazione e gli immaginari in costruzione invece di
costringerli ad interviste frontali sul loro passato, il viaggio e la
loro esperienza tragica. 

Abbiamo ascoltato, parlato,
mangiato, bevuto, scritto e registrato; scambiato storie, lavorato,
camminato insieme, disegnato e chiesto loro di disegnare ricordi,
sogni e desideri.
Oltre a raccontare i
vissuti abbiamo immaginato una possibilità di avvenire migliore, un
mondo nuovo dove l'unico straniero diventi la discriminazione e il
razzismo.ps. seguiamo e diffondiamo questo Manifesto:  
http://riserefugee.org/10-things-you-need-to-co...

who we areAndrea Staid professor of cultural anthropology at NABA ( new academy of beautiful arts), editor of the publishing house Eleuthera, collaborates with various newspapers. He is the author of The arditi del popolo  (The first Editions, 2007), anthropology of new slavery (Agency X, 2011), Wretched of the metropolis. Ethnographies migrants on the borders of legality (milieu 2014), I Without State. Power, economy and debt in primitive societies. (Bebert, 2015) Francesca Cogni, video maker and illustrator. I work with drawing, video and animation to produce experimental documentations of places, intimate stories and political topics. Drawing is used as a tool to investigate, create relations, share. The researches and the collected stories become movies, books, series of drawings.I'm mostly working on migration and asylum, languages, ecology, self-production and self-organization.I work in parallel in social and educational projects (workshops, lectures, screenings, discussions), where video and drawings are used as collective tools to think and work together.I work alone and with anthropologists, artists, social workers, musicians, architects…zebrablu.wordpress.com // vimeo.com/frensis/videos******************************************************chi siamoAndrea Staid è docente di antropologia culturale e di teoria e metodo dei mass media presso la NABA, redattore della casa editrice Elèuthera e collaboratore di numerose testate giornalistiche. Autore di: I dannati della metropoli (Milieu, 2014), Gli arditi del popolo (Edizioni La Fiaccola, 2007-Milieu 2015), Le nostre braccia. Meticciato e antropologia della nuova schiavitù (Agenzia x, 2011) e de I Senza Stato (Bebèrt, 2015).Francesca Cogni, videomaker e disegnatrice. Con il disegno, il video e l'animazione indaga sui luoghi, gli abitanti, i percorsi e le tematiche della contemporaneità. Il disegno diventa uno strumento di osservazione, di documentazione della realtà e di scambio. Le storie raccolte diventano film, serie di disegni, piccoli libri autoprodotti…Negli ultimi anni la sua ricerca prevalente riguarda le migrazioni, le lingue, la diversità culturale e la sostenibilità.La ricerca artistica è accompagnata e nutrita da progetti educativi in ambito prevalentemente sociale (laboratori, corsi, lezioni…), dove il video e il disegno diventano strumenti collettivi per confrontarsi, riflettere, raccontare la realtà e raccontarsi.Lavora da sola e con antropologi, artisti, danzatori, musicisti, architetti. zebrablu.wordpress.com // vimeo.com/frensis/videos

story:
- les FRAIS DE LIVRAISON sont INCLUS au CANADA -

La maison d’Édition BERBER 13-13 est née d’une seule histoire : BULLE, dont le premier tome est paru le 7 décembre 2012. C'est en mai 2014 que BERBER 13-13 ouvre officiellement ses portes à Québec et ce, sans l’aide d’aucune subvention. Trois nouveaux titres sont parus chez BerBer cet automne : LE FIL D’ARIANE, de Prévost, Masson et Labbé, le BOUDDHA BRISÉ, d’Esbé et de LA PETITE SUCEUSE, de D.Mathieu Cassendo.

Jusqu'à ce jour, nous avons réussi à devenir un éditeur spécialisé dans la BD fantastique québécoise. Plus d'une dizaine de scénaristes et dessinateurs collaborent dans notre studio de création en développant des univers parallèles. BERBER participe à tous les événements littéraires de la province et nos livres sont maintenant distribués partout au Canada, dans toutes les librairies.

.

Ce printemps, BERBER doit publier trois titres. La parution de ces trois titres est capitale. 

BULLE

La première oeuvre  à voir le jour en 2017 est DÉSESPOIR, le sixième tome de la saga BULLE, celui qui clôt le deuxième cycle de l'histoire imaginée par CY & DAM. Encore une fois, nous retrouvons Valérie Dandois au dessin et à l'encrage, William Côté aux couleurs et Marie Lamonde Simard  en tant qu'artiste de couverture. 

"​Un noyau de survivants s’accroche à la vie au dernier étage du Château St-Louis, dans l’appartement de Vincent et Aurélien. Sous la chaleur accablante d’un été indien qui n’en finit plus, ils tenteront de nettoyer leur environnement qui s’encrasse alors que la pandémie s’accentue. Petit à petit, les commodités de la civilisation disparaissent laissant la place à un hiver extrêmement menaçant."

LE BOUDDHA BRISÉ

En juillet c'est au tour d'ESBÉ de revenir en force avec le deuxième chapitre de son BOUDDHA BRISÉ.

"Alex est à la veille de la trentaine, mais il peine encore à trouver sa place dans le monde. Chaque obstacle semble destiné à le rapprocher d’une éventuelle dissociation. Qu’est-ce que la dissociation? L’incarnation en chair et en os, dans le réel, de nos désirs secrets les plus sombres et refoulés... Et Alex, qui refoule les siens depuis plusieurs décennies..."

LE PROJET "V"

Toujours en juillet, ce sera au tour de notre projet mystère, "Le projet V", à être offert à notre public. Dessiné par le talentueux Olivier Carpentier, l'oeuvre raconte la vie d'un personnage important de la culture populaire fantastique québécoise. Pour le moment, nous gardons pour nous le nom du scénariste...C'est une SURPRISE!!! Mais sachez que ce projet sera le cadeau de BERBER à la ville de Montréal pour son 375e. Et oui, on est comme ça.

En participant au financement de notre saison littéraire 2017, vous faites en sorte que BERBER puisse garder son indépendance tout en continuant à nourrir ses lecteurs d’univers qu’on ne voit presque jamais au Québec.

NOTRE OBJECTIF

Avec 25 000$, nous pourrons corriger, réviser et imprimer les trois œuvres à venir. L’argent servira aussi à imprimer tous les « prints » qui seront inclus dans vos commandes. Nous pourrons aussi vous envoyer vos cadeaux et payer les frais d’administration de la plateforme de sociofinancement. Nous voyons cette campagne comme une coup de pouce pour aider BERBER à soutenir son expansion.

(extrait de "Le fil d'Ariane", de Stéphanie Labbé, Amélie Prévost et Jo Masson, paru en novembre 2016)

DES FORFAITS DE FEU.

Nous vous offrons des forfaits variés qui vous permettent de mettre la main sur n’importe lequel des titres de la maison et de compléter votre collection.

Tous les fonds amassés serviront à la production des livres. Si nous n’atteignons pas notre objectif, nous continuerons à penser à d’autres solutions pour faire imprimer un projet à la fois. Si nous dépassons notre objectif, nous garderons l’excédent pour les projets de l’automne 2017. Notre seul ambition est de faire en sorte que nos artistes puissent rejoindre leurs lecteurs.

(Extrait de "La petite suceuse", vol 1, de D.Mathieu Cassendo, paru en novembre 2016)

COMMENT AIDER?

Chez BERBER, nous négocions avec le risque depuis le début de notre aventure d'entrepreneur culturel. Nous n'avons absolument rien à perdre et c'est ce qui fait notre force. Nos artistes ne souhaitent qu'une chose : Partager leur univers.

Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer, partagez le vidéo, parlez de nous. Nous avons besoin qu'un maximum de gens entende notre message pour faire en sorte que nos rêves continuent de s'incarner.

story:
Drag queen Mama Tits made her stamp on the Internet with a viral video at Seattle Pride, where she took a stand against antigay protestors in her blue rainbow outfit, challenging them on their hypocrisy and hateful rhetoric.


Now, Mama comes to the comics pages, courtesy of writer Charles "Zan" Christensen and artist Terry Blas, where she takes her fight to a new level, combatting bigoted supervillains!

MAMA TITS SAVES THE WORLD!

Granted a fraction of the powers of a pantheon of queer gods and goddesses, Mama assumes a superheroic mantle and uses her powers to protect the community from the evil forces that would deny them their rights to life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness.

Whether she's battling the evil Polyestra, The Piccolo, or the undead Reverend Plummetgood, Mama will need all her strength to keep the world safe for queer people.

The book features a script by Northwest Press founder Charles "Zan" Christensen, art by Terry Blas, colors by Marissa Louise, and bonus artwork by Sonya Samantha Saturday, Diego Gómez, and Justin Hall.

We are seeking $10,000 to fund the book, which will cover:

  • $4,000 to pay the artists (MOST important!)
  • $3,000 to print books and posters
  • $1,250 to send Mama to RuPaul's DragCon in May for the debut of the book!
  • $750 for postage to send out rewards
  • $1000 for crowdfunding fees

When we're done, we'll have a great book to spread Mama's message of love, acceptance, and fierceness that she can share with her fans at her shows, and Northwest Press can distribute all over the world!

story:
Short Summary

 

Howdy Everyone! This is like everything I ever wanted to do as an artists without having to deal with the head aches of working for the big two companies. I remember it was around 1 am back in 1991 when I drew the first sketch of the martians. I was in my room drawing hands when I put a body on top and they were born. Like the image above.  This is one of the first drawings I did back in 1991.   Over a few years I did the 10 classes of Handhunters. I designed the Ships and the stories and all the info needed for the characters. Even though the comic tries to stay close to the original material I did deviate from the names for the sake of the younger readers.

I see so many people crowd funding their comics and their ideas and making it into a career. I would love this to be the only thing I do and make it a living but first I have to win your trust and interest. I have learned so much from doing this book and what I need to work on for the second book.I think

I think you are going to like whats in here.  Just remember it is a introduction story more than anything.  Helps build up who the characters are. 

 

Let me take you into my mind starting with the Martian Handhunters. Inside the comic are the other titles I am working on and going to publish. This is going to be fun. Thank you for being here.

 

Whats in it for us all

 

For my first campaign I am going to start at 3000$ to see how it goes.  The money will be going to printing of the comic itself and the various prints that are in the campaign.  There are going to be stickers I am looking into making buttons and then there is the ever so evil shipping costs.

For the stickers I am going through Sticker Mule and with the Buttons I am using Pure Buttons.  

If I don't reach the goal then I am still fulfilling the promises to those that donated to the campaign.   

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

While I understand, better than most, how hard life can be and how every day we life can throw us for a loop at any time, anything you can do is helpful.  If you can't donate money I ask if you can share the campaign with your friends and family.  This is important to me and I am asking you to help me and The Martian Handhunters  be successful. 

 

If you share and/or contribute please use the ever so awesome IndieGogo share tools.  Everything is easier with short cuts and IndieGogo gives them to us.

story:
Takashi the Wanderer is story about a boxer roaming post apocalyptic NYC. In this first issue we find him navigating through Queens. He starts working for a woman  named Emily Paige, who runs a water purification ranch and has use of her great grandfathers technology from the old world. 

In this new world all knowledge of boxing and martial arts has been washed away with time. Takashi was raised by a band of monks who were the last to practice the art of boxing. After their monastery was destroyed Takashi was the lone survivor. He has to use his knowledge of the sweet science to protect himself and others from the warrior tribes that control NYC. 

This comic is a full color  24 pages of story/art and extra creator content  - 32 pages altogether.

 



My name is Victor Rojas a USA certified boxing coach and illustrator from NYC.  Takashi the Wanderer is my introduction into the comic world. As few years ago I decided to slowly transition from my boxing career as a coach to an illustrator and comic book artist. I had to give up my art dreams early on to raise my son. I got into the boxing game as a trainer and coach as a way to support myself. I am very thankful to the sport of boxing for being able to help me live. Not only put food on my table, but more importantly for giving me the belief that anything is possible.
 

As an artist  I was heavily influenced by all the 90s greats like McFarlane, Lee, Silvestri etc.. always knew I’d return to the thing I was meant to do which is comics. I’ve built up my skills and updated my style to be able to produce work that I am proud of. On this book I do all the line art, coloring, lettering and writing .  





 

 

The book is finished and ready for print. If this campaign is successful all funds will goto printing the book, custom boxing gloves, hand wraps, shipping and materials. Here are your perks :


 

ROUND 1 : SIGNED COPY OF THE BOOK

 

ROUND 2 : SIGNED COPY AND BOOKMARK

 

 

 


ROUND 3 : SIGNED COPY, HAND DRAWN SKETCH CARD AND BOOKMARK 


 

 

ROUND 4 : SIGNED COPY AND TAKASHI BOXING GLOVES 

 

 


MAIN EVENT :  ALL PERKS INCLUDED + WRAPS 

 

 

 

THE BARN BURNER :  ALL PERKS PLUS 1 ON 1 BOXING SESSION * MUST BE IN NYC  DAY OF SCHEDULED SESSION



 

TAKASHI’S PUNK ROCK NIGHT AT GUSSY’S ON 11-8-19 




 

 


 

 

 

A big thank you to all. I hope you find Takashi the Wanderer #1 as fun to read, as I had making it!
story_txt: Takashi the Wanderer is story about a boxer roaming post apocalyptic NYC. In this first issue we find him navigating through Queens. He starts working for a woman  named Emily Paige, who runs a water purification ranch and has use of her great grandfathers technology from the old world. In this new world all knowledge of boxing and martial arts has been washed away with time. Takashi was raised by a band of monks who were the last to practice the art of boxing. After their monastery was destroyed Takashi was the lone survivor. He has to use his knowledge of the sweet science to protect himself and others from the warrior tribes that control NYC. This comic is a full color  24 pages of story/art and extra creator content  - 32 pages altogether. My name is Victor Rojas a USA certified boxing coach and illustrator from NYC.  Takashi the Wanderer is my introduction into the comic world. As few years ago I decided to slowly transition from my boxing career as a coach to an illustrator and comic book artist. I had to give up my art dreams early on to raise my son. I got into the boxing game as a trainer and coach as a way to support myself. I am very thankful to the sport of boxing for being able to help me live. Not only put food on my table, but more importantly for giving me the belief that anything is possible. As an artist  I was heavily influenced by all the 90s greats like McFarlane, Lee, Silvestri etc.. always knew I’d return to the thing I was meant to do which is comics. I’ve built up my skills and updated my style to be able to produce work that I am proud of. On this book I do all the line art, coloring, lettering and writing .    The book is finished and ready for print. story:
SOUVENIRS DE SABURA

Le récit surréaliste inédit d'Adrien Fournier enfin édité!

  • http://adrienfournier.com
  • 96 pages d'aventure dans une future dystopie, servi par de magnifiques images et un humour noir.
  • Le livre est fini depuis 2011, mais j'ai choisi de le distribuer à mes lecteurs directement.

Qu'est-ce que vous pouvez faire et quel est le but de cette campagne?

  • Dans ma vidéo fleuve https://youtu.be/BVksyc4yex0 j'explique comment j'ai réussi à rendre le livre disponible à partir de 13€.
  • Vous pouvez donner plus, évidemment et même choisir de recevoir de magnifiques cadeaux en bonus à la fin de la campagne.
  • J'ai besoin des fonds pour la retouche, commencer l'impression et payer la main-d’œuvre à l'envoi. Le CNL a déjà payé mon travail d'écriture.

Toujours livré

Achetez sans risque, car le goal est "flexible":

  • Toute commande lors de la campagne sera honorée, vous recevrez tous vos prix en fin/début d'année. Même si le but n'est pas atteint complétement.
  • L'histoire se déroule en fin d'année, c'est de l'immersion, meilleure que la VR!

Le But

Le but est de vendre ici 300 exemplaires, puis de réserver environs 150 exemplaires pour les libraires via les services de distribution indépendants et le dépôt.

  • Auteur depuis de longues année, j'ai observé le marché. Sabúra est sans compromis et très personnel. La vente direct complète cette approche à merveille.
  • Si vous êtes intéres(sé(e)) pour promouvoir ce livre, contactez-moi lettreadrienfournier@gmail.com

Si vous souhaitez m'aider autrement que financièrement

retrouvons nous sur la page facebook:

  • https://www.facebook.com/groups/1256213017871575 .
  • De toute façon, vous avez cet e-mail de contact, n'hésitez pas lettreadrienfournier@gmail.com .

story:
The World of Sidewinder

Sidewinder takes place in the far-off future and among all the technological advancements, society had commercialized gene splicing. At first, it was beneficial to aid those with medical conditions and genetic disorders, then, like many advancements in science, there was abuse. Black Market splicing augmented humans with everything from unnatural animal-like strengths and abilities to complete physical alterations. Like a drug, it caught on and through the years the mutated offspring of these individuals were anything but human, they were known as Chimera. Soon after a war known as the “Genetic Crusade” ignited, it was Chimera against the diminishing Human race. The free peoples of the Central Planets united. They fought and defeated the Chimera at a great cost. After the war, any remaining Chimera was forced into the outer rim planets, a haven for outlaws and undesirables. So it’s in this setting that our Bounty Hunter, Sidewinder lives. Like most in his profession, for the most part, he wants nothing to do with the United Earth Government and tries his best to stay off the grid avoiding any Authorities or corrupted Civic Dignitaries. Sidewinder along with his two fellow crafty Bounty Hunters, Lucky and Trinity, track down their usual fare of bounties. Normally Sidewinder is strictly about business but it turns personal when he catches news that an old friend from “The War” has been murdered. Sidewinder sets out for revenge and uncovers shady clues surrounding his friend's murder and is quickly thrown into a much larger and sinister plot.

 

What You Get

Sidewinder is mostly finished and will run about 80+ pages and is set to be published at the summer of 2021 as a graphic novel. We have a wide range of physical rewards for the book, from pin-up posters, trading cards, bookmarks and we would like to make some other special perks as the campaign develops.  Every penny that comes in will go towards the production of SIDEWINDER, helping to cover all the expenses that come with printing and advertising a book like this.

Stretch Goals

  1. 1K Sidewinder trading card with every book purchased.
  2. 5K bounty hunters Lucky and Trinity trading cards with every book purchased.
  3. 10K all characters trading cards with every book purchased.
  4. 25K Sidewinder T-shirt Perk.
  5. 50K Sidewinder Hardcover Book Perk
  6. 75K TBA
  7. 100K TBA

The Mission

We want SIDEWINDER to go longer than just one story. Should we go over our goal, we'll keep putting the funding right back into the project for any new perks and later volumes, ensuring that the SIDEWINDER story will fulfill its entire run.









    The Challenges

    Sidewinder's first three volumes were published by Antarctic Press 3-years ago, we were not able to finish the story arc and the final issue due to a miscommunication with the publisher. Even tho AP tried to publish the last issue, there was no room on the schedule or on the press to do so. Pitching a science fiction graphic novel like this can be a tough sell in an industry saturated with Super Heroes & Zombies (Even though we love Super Heroes & Zombies lol). There are very few publishers that would take a chance on a Sci-Fi project like SIDEWINDER and it’s even harder for an unknown comic book creator to get published. That's why we’re going down the “crowdfunding” route to get the necessary funds to make the SIDEWINDER graphic novel a reality.

    What’s great about Indiegogo is that it gives new intellectual properties, ideas, and creations outside of the mainstream comic book industry a chance to make it out into the world, this project is a perfect example of that.

    Ways You Can Help

    We need your help and support to make this project a reality. You can help by making a pledge to fund our project and then spread the word on all of your favorite social networks, forums, and tell your friends and loved ones about #SIDEWINDER. However, If you cant pledge any money to the project fund please help us get the word out to as many people as possible, every little bit counts.

    The Staff

    Story: Dennis Chacon.

    Writer: Eric Chacon.

    Pencils & Inks: Dennis Chacon, Chad Baptiste.

    Colors: Dennis Chacon, Brian Janchez.

    Editors: Dennis Chacon, Fabian Falconi.

story:
The Story

The story is about a chimpanzee whose family gets poached to a local zoo.  The young chimp is orphaned to a mysterious jungle temple, sanctuary to the Mixed Martial Apes, who’ve sworn devotion to the grappling arts as a means to serve and protect their rightful heir to the jungle throne in their fight against habitat deforestation. The young chimp learns the art of Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, Judo and Wrestling and vows to use his skills to rescue his captive family, and free all imprisoned animals from the zoo.  Imagine a cross between The Planet Of The Apes, The Jungle Book and Karate Kid.

 

The Goal & What We Need

Our goal with this campaign is to hire our dream artist Mr. Ton Lima as the illustrator for this book.  In order to complete this 90-page book, we need to raise $12,000 to be used solely for artist compensation.  100% of all the funds go straight to the artist (sketching, inking, coloring and lettering).

 

Why Is This Book Valuable, And Why Us?

Parents who train in any Martial-Art generally desire that their children to share in that interest (this also seems to be true for spouses, siblings and friends).  The reasons for this may vary from concerns of basic self-defense and personal security, to the conceptual introduction of discipline and respect, or simply as an enjoyable bond-strengthening hobby between parent and child.  The concern, however, is that they push their well-intended ambitions too hard, turning it into a negative experience for the new student, who may end up disliking the Martial-Art or seeing training as a forced chore.

Our humble opinion is that a good approach to spark interest is to keep things playful and focused on having fun.  This book is an introduction to the grappling Martial-Arts, without the requirement of training-gear or even leaving the home.  This book is an interest sparker into the grappling universe.

An example of a similar endeavor of self-improvement is a training game we created (www.gameofrolls.com) which aims at developing real grappling abilities through goal centred sparring using unconventional grappling scenarios.  This happens to be where the idea for this book and the main character Chimpis Champ originated. Similarly, this project was created out of passion, and we hope it shows our commitment to the learning and developmental aspects of becoming a Martial-Artist.

Other than that, everybody on the creative team including Victor (myself, the author), Gulliver (studio manager) and Ton (artist), are all personally immersed in training Brazilian Jiu Jitsu.  In addition, we all happen work in relation to art and artistic expression.  So let me reassure you that this absolutely is the best possible team for the job.

To Date

To date, the story has been written and the artist studio has been contracted.  Ton (the main artist) has committed to working for at least 6 consecutive months to illustrate this story, completing an average of 15 pages per month.  To show you our progress, we will post a sneak peak of Tons work every week as it is completed (without giving away too much of the storyline of course!)

 

If You Help Spread The Word..

Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can still help in a big way!  By sharing this campaign on social media and helping spread the word, you are directly influencing the potential number of contributors for this book.  Just use the hashtag #ChimpisChamp and if we achieve our set goal, and if you generated a buzz, then we’ll send you a gift to show you our gratitude for your support.

With your assistance we can turn this idea into a read worthy reality.

Thank you!

story:
When growing in the ex-USSR you see those monuments everywhere. One day you will think - why are there so many of them? 

Are these really just monuments?

Hello, we are a team of animation and design professionals. For many years we’ve been keeping our own story about the biggest, most secret Soviet project:

GORB: Cold War era battle mecha system

Right now you can participate in the development of the first chapter. We offer many options - digital or printed comics, resin or metal figures - and all this is just the beginning. So, feel free to preorder your part of adventure (we have LIFETIME DISCOUNT for our first backers).

Part 1. Comic Book

The story was in the works for more than 15 years. There is no politics - just atmospheric, sci-fi "road-movie" adventure.  
 
There were several attempts to materialize the story, probably too big and ambitious. And then we met a great artist, Alexander Utkin. He applied his own unique hand-drawn style, and the characters came to life.
 
Alexander: «It’s an epic battle between the Past and the Future. You can’t hide from it, but you may have fun during it»
 
 
Read an interview with the creators of Project GORB on the Comic Book and Movie Reviews.​

As an animation studio we wanted this story to be highly cinematic, and it took us more than one year of work to develop this unique visual style.

Read the excerpt (opens in a new window):

So you can contribute to the comic book development only. We have digital and printed comics, T-Shirt with a logo, and impressive A2-sized poster by the animation artist Natalia Grebionkina (all available both in English and Russian). First buyers of the Story Pack will get the LIFETIME DISCOUNT for all our further phisical goods.

 

 

Part 2. Robot

First, we intended to tell the story as a big graphic novel. But then it became so alive, that we decided to let it out, straight to the physical world. So, every issue of the comics will be accompanied by a collectible item.

2.1. Bust Resin Kit

A bust is smallest in the line of figures, but its robotic head is big enough to show the details.

2.2. Figure Resin Kit

Statue of soviet battle robot has two sizes - 7" and 12" (18cm/30cm). Designing the statue took more than a year. We consulted with engineers and scientists  to develop a highly original robot concept that you will find in the forthcoming issues of the comic.

It was a non-trivial task to integrate the robot into the chaotically fractured concrete shell. Three scanned statues were used for sculpting, along with hard surface modelling, dynamic fractures and cloth simulation.

The work is still in progress, all you see here are the prototypes. The final product will vary (but only for better quality).

For pricing see the table. This perk also includes the Story Pack. 
 

2.3. Figure Metal Kit

Cold-cast iron edition of the kit is like a half-ready figurine (for those, who don't feel like  painting it). It needs just a bit of polishing after assembling. Real rust, metal scratches and other weathering can be easily implemented.

All you see here are the prototypes. The final product will vary (but only for better quality).

This perk also includes the Story Pack.

2.4. Assembled Statue

We decided to introduce this perk for those who don't want to do deal with chemicals at home. For you it will be a figurine ready for exposition, assembled, weathered and polished, for us it will be like a step to producing  more complicated full-color figures.

*image simulated

This perk also includes the Story Pack.

3. Pricing and shipping.

Story Pack included everywhere, and we have 5% LIFETIME DISCOUNT to all further physical products by Condenser Labs.

4. Timeline

The production of the figurine starts as soon as the campaign reaches its main goal. We have a lot to improve in the model, including upgrade of our 3D printing equipment, research for cold casting etc. Shipping is scheduled for the mid of 2019.

5. Team

This project includes a lot of aspects, from story writing to 3D printing and resin casting, so only such multi-talented team can handle it.

6. Risks and challenges

Though  we are not new to the world of storytelling, this is our first project with a real "physical" product. It's pretty scary, but we’ve already made a long way researching 3D printing, materials and technologies, so it's too late to turn back. Anyway, the project is crazy, the team is great, so it has to be fun to do it with your help.

7. What's next?

We have big plans for this story, but that's not the only story we have (you can see a little more here)

So, you can spread the word about this campaign to help Condenser Labs become an independent storytelling company.

Thank you!

Real rust, metal scratches and other weathering can be easily implemented.All you see here are the prototypes. The final product will vary (but only for better quality).This perk also includes the Story Pack.2.4. Assembled StatueWe decided to introduce this perk for those who don't want to do deal with chemicals at home. For you it will be a figurine ready for exposition, assembled, weathered and polished, for us it will be like a step to producing  more complicated full-color figures.

*image simulated
This perk also includes the Story Pack.
3. Pricing and shipping.
Story Pack included everywhere, and we have 5% LIFETIME DISCOUNT to all further physical products by Condenser Labs.

4. Timeline

The production of the figurine starts as soon as the campaign reaches its main goal. We have a lot to improve in the model, including upgrade of our 3D printing equipment, research for cold casting etc. Shipping is scheduled for the mid of 2019.

5. Team
This project includes a lot of aspects, from story writing to 3D printing and resin casting, so only such multi-talented team can handle it.

6. Risks and challenges
Though  we are not new to the world of storytelling, this is our first project with a real "physical" product. It's pretty scary, but we’ve already made a long way researching 3D printing, materials and technologies, so it's too late to turn back. Anyway, the project is crazy, the team is great, so it has to be fun to do it with your help.

7. What's next?
We have big plans for this story, but that's not the only story we have (you can see a little more here)
So, you can spread the word about this campaign to help Condenser Labs become an independent storytelling company.
Thank you!

story:
Call Me Cujo...

Have we met?  I've always been an artist, not always on the page.  In the age of information and connectivity I found a mystery that transcended cultures and I pulled on that thread until it became the truth. The BL^CK BOOK v2 comic is that journey and no one can be told what it is but you'll soon know.

You Want In?

Yeah there's a lot of narrative out there - too much really, but you haven't met the BL^CK BOOK, the most dangerous design in the comic book medium.  

Why Get Involved?

What makes the BL^CK BOOK v2 the most dangerous design?  Is it the greatest mystery ever approached? Is it the fact a dozen or so artists from all over the world came together to tell it?  Is it the crowdfunding model designed to sustain indie artists?  In an age of media networks burning and fandoms in wreckage the BL^CK BOOK just may be the start of a new conversation.

Define 'new'

The BL^CK BOOK is built on a new model, the #thecujomodel.  This crowdfunding model is designed to go viral - and pays % residuals to every creator on every purchase.  As escalating goals are met the % balances out thus creating a dynamic marketplace for all involved.

Beyond that the BL^CK BOOK v2 can be tipped in post-production via venmo/paypal, making it a publication designed to be shared. 

Whats The Damage?

$25 bucks + shipping outside U.S. No perks. No exclusives.  Just the truth :)

  • The BL^CK BOOK v2 is 44 pages of full surreal color and revelations.  
  • Over a dozen artists collaborated on its visual narrative.
  • Limited run as per the usual, so don't sleep on it.  
  • Flex campaign so you shall receive. 
  • I have successfully completed 2 crowdfunding campaigns.

Close Me Out.

Yeah- the BL^CK BOOK is ambitious but it has to be, in an age where media networks crumble, this comic, this design and this passion project is to help indie artists, about half of its contributors were crowd sourced from the #Joevember hashtag, its built to help community.  Help it go viral, and you may just empower a free/sustainable network design.

Final Move...

In 2020 you don't get to blink and neither does the most dangerous design.  What is the BL^CK BOOK v2?  Did you come up with GI JOE.  Did you find conspiracies along the way.  Are you a romantic.  Me too. Join the BL^CK BOOK v2, you may solve a mystery.

Thank you for reading and supporting, I'm humbled to be in good company.  

 Curtis

story:
Short Summary

My name is Redd Kaiman. I’m a filmmaker, animator, and a comic book author. 

 

For such a long time, I have wanted to tell a fantasy story that was similar to ones I grew up watching. The stories similar to the ones we have always wanted to read and watch as kids growing up. 

 

In these troubled times, I have worked hard at creating King Firepower in the hopes to create something that has kept the magic alive. I have collaborated on this project with Tim Sparvero, an artist who has worked on such campaigns like Passenger and Infinity Roads. 

 

Anyone who contributes to this campaign is a participant in magic. Anyone who contributes to this campaign will have an answer the next time they see someone complain about the lack of originality in the world today.

 

What We Need & What You Get

On top of owning a physical copy of the comic, we also have certain perks that will include our fans and give them an ability to cameo in future issues of King Firepower. 

 

Right now, we need funding so we can continue our further issues of our graphic novel. Our current funding goals are a vote of confidence that people want to see King Firepower in its current form and that we can keep going to tell Princess Mina’s story. 

 

We want to reward our fans for helping us with King Firepower. We also have custom perks that allow our fans to cameo themselves in future issues of King Firepower. 

 

The Impact

You guys will allow us to make this vision a reality. While I have made animations in the past (Chomp Sushi: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VGC-KHAnfVU), this graphic novel will allow me to fully realize the stories that need to be told. We have already finished the first issue of this graphic novel, and your continued support will allow us to finish our story.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You guys can help us by spreading the word through social media as well as letting all your friends know about us.

story:
Mission 

When I started working on Black Sun, I only knew that I wanted to create something meaningful. I had seen what was out there, in terms of media focused on new stories, and I understood that there was a gap.

 

To me, there was only one choice. I had to create something of my own, and I had to do it in my own way.

 

The response my webtoon has  received is phenomenal and As the following continues to grow, I feel more and more confident that I have stumbled into something important. I could not be any happier than I am with the way this webtoon has gone. Every day, I feel the same deep sense of motivation that inspired the webtoon in the first place.

 

I know that it can get even bigger, though.

I know that, together, we can do even more through Black Sun.

 

Before I explain how in more detail, let me tell you a little about what Black Sun is to me and how it has grown so far.


 

Shonen with a Purpose

 

While Black Sun is a fully engaging supernatural Shinobi horror series in its own right, something that all Shonen fans will appreciate, is that it inspires and celebrates new creative minds.

 

This webtoon is Created to motivate 


 

In order to foster a stronger self-image in the Black community, we need to escape the vicious cycle that these negative portrayals perpetuate.

 

That is, on a fundamental level, what Black Sun is about. I have created my webtoon as an expression of other possibilities – of stories that aren't about Black trauma like slavery, poverty, and broken homes.


 

Entertainment for All

I take my responsibility seriously. When I sit down and start working on a new webtoon, I understand that I can take it one of two ways, either stepping up and doing something positive for the community or falling into the endless traps of stereotypes and dangerous tropes.

 

Throughout my creative career, I have chosen to do the former. I have sought to tell stories that will encourage the next generation to see themselves as the capable people I know they can be.

At the same time, I think of myself as a creator for all audiences. I have developed Black Sun as a webtoon that everyone can enjoy.

 

Whether you put it on for your sons or daughters, because you know it will shape their minds for the better, or you sit down and watch it with your friends, because the stories are just that good, I am doing my job right.


Growth to Date

 

Currently, Black Sun is the #1 series in the Action genre on Webtoon Canvas. It has also gained more than 41,000 followers on Instagram and 67 patrons on Patreon, both reflections of how wide-reaching the webtoon is.

 

Every Wednesday, I come out with new webtoons. That is not going to change.

What I would like to do, though, is expand the brand behind Black Sun – by turning the webtoon into an animated series.


Although major producers have offered to buy the IP for Black Sun, I have turned them down every time, preferring to carry the vision out on my own.

 

If that sounds like the kind of thing that you would like to be a part of, now is the time to get involved.


 

What I Need & What You Get

 

Right now, I am turning to you for help raising the funds that I need to transform the Black Sun webtoon into a high-quality animated series. My goal is ${amount}, which will enable me to hire animators, voiceover artists, and other creatives and professionals who feel as dedicated to Black Sun as I do.

 

To say thanks to everyone who contributes to this campaign, I am offering some exclusive rewards, including early access to the debut episodes of the Black Sun animated series and limited-edition Black Sun merchandise.

 

Contribute now and help me bring the world of Black Sun to life!


Risks & Challenges

 

Because Black Sun is already online, as a webtoon, there is no risk that you're going to see the brand up and disappear. I will continue to work on the webtoon, doing new releases every Wednesday, just as I have been. Launching an animated series takes another level of work, though. Unless I reach the funding goal I have set, I will not be able to move forward with that aspect of the Black Sun brand as quickly as I would like.

 

Whatever happens, you can count on me to remain open throughout this process. I will provide regular updates about the progress that I make, letting you know all of the steps that I am taking to get this animated series up.


One More Way to Help

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Black Sun by sharing a link to the campaign page on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of Black Sun, the smoother the next year or so is going to go for me. It is my dream to get this animated series made.

 

Let's make it happen!

 

I appreciate all your support, and I thank you for your time.

story:
The Wizard of Oz is a timeless fantasy story known the world over. Lovecraft, and more notably Cthulhu, have been in our nightmares for more than 100 years. Comic creators have been telling stories in these worlds since the creation of the comic book. I have always loved these universes for years, and that's what inspired me to create this anthology.

 

 

What do you get with Cthulhu Invades Oz?

Cthulhu Invades Oz is a 160-page FULL-COLOR GRAPHIC NOVEL comic in Standard American comic size, on high-quality gloss paper.

Backers get various cover choices -- HARDCOVER or SOFTCOVER.

This crossover between CTHULHU and OZ is a comic filled with action, adventure, comedy, and tragedy.

At higher pledge levels, backers will access campaign exclusive limited-edition items (COLLECTORS BOXES, EXTRA PRINTS)

 

Who Will Love Cthulhu Invades Oz?

Fans of Wizard of Oz

Fans of Cthulhu/Lovecraft

Fans of Oz-related modern fiction- Wicked, Tin Man, The Great and Powerful, Emerald City

Fans of Lovecraft-related fiction - Lovecraft Country, Dagon, Dark City

People who like stories that encompass elements of horror, magic, and science in a classic setting.

Collectors of high quality, modern, independent TRADE PAPERBACK ANTHOLOGIES from amazing talent throughout INDIE COMICS!

People who enjoy unique takes and twists on familiar characters 

Over 50 incredible comic creators got together to bring the blending of two different universes in the mystical world of Baum's Wizard of Oz and the horrifying world that is the work of Lovecraft's Cthulhu. When the Great Cthulhu invades Oz! This was war will change OZ FOREVER! This anthology tells one big story through the eyes of the different residents of Oz. 

 

WELCOME TO THE BLOODY BRICK ROAD

 

 Creators include  

Richard Rivera (Stabbity Bunny, Shadowplay, Head of Scoot Imprint for Scout Comics), David Byrne (Stake, Co-Publisher Scout), Russell Nohelty (Ichabod Jones: Monster Hunter), Greg A. Elysée(Is'nana the Were-Spider), Jonathan Hedrick (The Recount, Freak Show), Jamie Primack (Binary Star),  Kurt Belcher (Rottentail), Travis Gibb (Broke Down And Four Dead Bodies, Voodoo Nations), Brian Silverbax (Loggerhead), Chuck Pineau (Belial), Jerome Gagnon (Tellos), Clara Meath (Shadow Play), Emilio Utrera (Lucier's Knight), David Galiano (Savage Bastards),  Stonie Willams (Villainous),  Brian Silvera (Bun),  Kyrun Silva (Xob), Joel Rodriguez  ( Dusk County Chronicles), Steve Ekstrom (Negative Burns),  Eric Hawkins (Zombiful World Of Oz), Kathryn Frizzell (The Absentee),Tyler Carpenter (Demons), Mikal Barker (Midnight Carousel), Rob Andersin (Barbara Unleashed), Nicolas Touris (Pixie Dust),  Ryan Shimek (The Pit), Caleb Palmquist (A Small Favor), Emily Riesett (Kyrra: Alien Jungle Girl),  Craig Florence (Local Haunts, Always Punch Nazi's), Micheal Watson (Hotshots),  Martha Schwartz (Seed Seekers), Claudia Giuliani ( Dogdays ), Luke Stone (Hybrids), James Burton (Damage Inc.), Matt Knowles & Steph Cannon (Tales From Nocturnia, Heirs of Isildur), Robby Bragdon (Collapse),  Sunil Gharge (Freakshow Princess), Allen Ellsworth (Hurricane Harmonie and the Mystery of Plush Hollow), Danny Quick (Aceblade) Michael Spivey, Sam Boother

 

Covers & Pin-Ups

Etienne Derepentigny (Dead Kingdom), Kyle Willis (Pouches), Dirk Grobb (Mr. Disaster), J.m. Hunter (BAM TOO!), Kurt Belcher (Rottentail)

 

Editorial Team

Proofreaders

 Wyndi Gale (Belial), Katrina Roets (Teddy Bear Tales)

Editors

Heather Gibb (Broke Down And Four Dead Bodies), Chuck Pineau (Belial)

 

Why is this book going to be so awesome?

1. It's 145+ pages of glorious comics! - That's a massive amount of awesome comics about the characters we love from Oz and the monsters of the Cthulhu Mythos! The book also includes 10 poems created in the style of Lovecraft. We have 19 stories from over 50 creators.

2. It's gonna be in hardcover! - Yes, there is both a HARDCOVER and SOFTCOVER option.

3. Glossy art paper - Most books are printed in gloss lamination, trapping all the glorious line work under an ugly, gross, yellow film. This anthology is different. It's printed on glossy art paper, which means the ink shines on top of the paper and looks like it's shimmering, just like any other high-quality art book on the market today.

4. Our creators have credits from all of your favorite companies. Our creators have worked with SCOUT, MAD CAVE, IMAGE, SOURCE POINT, ANTARCTIC PRESS, and more!

 

Tell Me More About The Book

Will it just be about THE GREAT CTHULHU INVADING OZ?? No, we have many of your favorite LOVECRAFT creatures and gods that will be included in this book (You may even see a familiar location or two). We tried to use tons of CTHULHU MYTHOS to give all of your favorite LOVECRAFT characters a voice.

 

 

What OZ characters can I expect to see? We have so many of your beloved Oz characters!! Most of the characters are from the FIRST TWO NOVELS - WIZARD OF OZ and RETURN TO OZ. You will see Dorothy, Scarecrow, Tin Man, The Wizard, Toto, Tik Tok, Munchkins, Glinda, the Wicked Witch, and MORE!! 

-BUT WAIT, THERE IS MORE!!!!!!! POETRY! We had poet David Greshel (Neon Sunrise Publishing) create select character poetry in a Lovecraft-style to add flavor and context to this amazing book!

Poetry by David Greshel


 

 

What Exactly Is This Indigogo For?

The team has already invested thousands of dollars and thousands of man-hours into the development of this colliding world of CTHULHU INVADES OZ .

CTHULHU INVADES OZ is 100% complete and we are just doing the last edits to make this book ready to print.

With your support here on Indiegogo, we can truly create the most incredible crossover that comics has EVER SEEN!! We have tried to create pledge levels for everyone!!!  From HARDCOVER to SOFTCOVER!! This book is a must-have.

The book also includes 10 poems created in the style of Lovecraft. We have 19 stories from over 50 creators.2. It's gonna be in hardcover! - Yes, there is both a HARDCOVER and SOFTCOVER option.3. Glossy art paper - Most books are printed in gloss lamination, trapping all the glorious line work under an ugly, gross, yellow film. This anthology is different. It's printed on glossy art paper, which means the ink shines on top of the paper and looks like it's shimmering, just like any other high-quality art book on the market today.4. Our creators have credits from all of your favorite companies. Our creators have worked with SCOUT, MAD CAVE, IMAGE, SOURCE POINT, ANTARCTIC PRESS, and more! Tell Me More About The BookWill it just be about THE GREAT CTHULHU INVADING OZ?? No, we have many of your favorite LOVECRAFT creatures and gods that will be included in this book (You may even see a familiar location or two). We tried to use tons of CTHULHU MYTHOS to give all of your favorite LOVECRAFT characters a voice.  What OZ characters can I expect to see? We have so many of your beloved Oz characters!! Most of the characters are from the FIRST TWO NOVELS - WIZARD OF OZ and RETURN TO OZ. You will see Dorothy, Scarecrow, Tin Man, The Wizard, Toto, Tik Tok, Munchkins, Glinda, the Wicked Witch, and MORE!! -BUT WAIT, THERE IS MORE!!!!!!! POETRY! We had poet David Greshel (Neon Sunrise Publishing) create select character poetry in a Lovecraft-style to add flavor and context to this amazing book!Poetry by David Greshel  What Exactly Is This Indigogo For?The team has already invested thousands of dollars and thousands of man-hours into the development of this colliding world of CTHULHU INVADES OZ .CTHULHU INVADES OZ is 100% complete and we are just doing the last edits to make this book ready to print.With your support here on Indiegogo, we can truly create the most incredible crossover that comics has EVER SEEN!! We have tried to create pledge levels for everyone!!!  From HARDCOVER to SOFTCOVER!! This book is a must-have.

story:
IT'S ALIVE! is proud to finally collect all five issues of COMBAT we have published individually over the last few years.  Originally published in the 1960's by Dell, we have been bringing them back into print, issue by issue, after all these years.  Each issue has been lovingly cleaned up and restored by Allan Harvey, and we have added new content to each issue, including new covers by an all-star line-up of artists (seen below), and new historical essays about WWII and COMBAT.  After many requests for a collection, we decided it was time!  This new collection contains five issues of COMBAT, which includes Pearl Harbor, Dunkirk, Midway, Battle for Britain, and D-Day.  Filled with over 250 pages of World Word II greatness, this hard cover collection is a must-have!

Each issue of COMBAT features true stories from World War II, illustrated by comic book legend, WWII veteran, and Eisner Award-nominee Sam Glanzman!

You can also pick up a copy of this collection signed by Sam Glanzman's widow, Sue Glanzman!

 

THESE ARE THE ISSUES OF COMBAT INCLUDED IN THIS COLLECTION. . .

The Pearl Harbor issue features the story "Pearl Harbor," plus the back-up stories "Defeat of the Spanish Armada" and "A Deadly Weapon".

 

The Dunkirk issue features the stories "Dunkirk," "Channel Battle," and "Last to Leave".  Plus the back-up story "One by Sea" and the 1-page stories "A Most Deadly Air Raid" and "The First Aircraft Carrier".

 

The Midway issue features the main story "Battle of Midway" plus the back-up story "Out the Gate", and the 1-page story "High Ground".

 

The Battle for Britain issue features the stories "Wreck the R.A.F.!", "Strike the Fighter Fields!", and "The Decisive Days".  Plus the back-up story "The Puny, Little Yank".

 

The D-Day issue features the main story "The Normandy Invasion," plus the back-up story, "The Train to Nowhere," and the 1-page story "Secret Weapon".

 

THIS IS THE VARIANT COVER GALLERY INCLUDED IN THIS COLLECTION. . .

Pearl Harbor variant cover by Dave Dorman

 

Dunkirk variant cover by Walter Simonson

 

Midway variant cover by Russ Heath

 

Battle for Britain variant cover by John McCrea

 

D-Day variant cover by Russ Braun

 

THIS IS THE RETRO COVER GALLERY INCLUDED IN THIS COLLECTION. . .

 

Pearl Harbor retro cover

 

Dunkirk retro cover

 

Midway retro cover

 

Battle for Britain retro cover

 

D-Day retro cover

 

AND THESE ARE JUST A FEW OF THE RETRO ADS INCLUDED IN THIS COLLECTION. . .

 

 

Also included in this collection are thought-provoking new essays about WWII, COMBAT and Sam Glanzman by Steven Fears, Dean Webb, Alex Dueben, John Freeman, and Richard J. Arndt.

And incredible vintage essays about General John Pershing, Lord Gort, General George Patton Jr., The Dolittle Raiders, and General Omar N. Bradley.

 

At $40 per book, we will need to sell 125 copies to hit our funding goal of $5000.  We are asking for this amount to cover printing and shipping costs, which won't be cheap for a 250 page, hard cover book like this.  But we are confident that there must be at least 125 people out there who love war comics, Sam Glanzman, or both, and who would happily part with $40 to own a copy of this amazing collection.

You can also pick up a copy of this collection signed by Sam Glanzman's widow, Sue Glanzman!

 

Finally, enjoy this story from the D-DAY issue of COMBAT, entitled "The Train to Nowhere".  Aside from being a great little read, I hope this preview will act as an example of the type of professional clean-up and restoration work that has been done on every issue of this series by Allan Harvey. 

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you so much for visiting our campaign.  Above all else, we hope to keep the work of Sam Glanzman alive, by delivering this powerful 250+ page collection to as many people as possible!

story:
Herverity is an adult limited series about a young 17-year-old girl named Aislinn Byrnes, who is dealing with the loss of a family member. After one crazy night, she soon realizes that she is one of the last of her kind. Unfortunately, she was not the only one to make that discovery, as a dark and looming threat closes in on her. Aislinn must quickly decide on who to trust and what her next move will be. One wrong choice could mean the end of her, and most importantly...the end of her kind.

If you're a fan of Stranger Things, then this will be a perfect series for you to dive in. Witness the banter between our three protagonists as they journey their way to stop the incoming danger that is after them.  Lots of emotions, lots of F-bombs, and lots of blood!

 

Let me break it down to you:

  • The $500 will go directly towards the printing and shipping of Herverity #1 along with its variant covers. Anything over will go towards the stretch goal.
  • Herverity #2 will begin production regardless whether we meet our stretch goal or not. Completing the stretch goal will just cut the production in half. So you can get issue #2 in your hands by Spring 2022

 

 

 

For every issue throughout these mini-series, there will be a portrait variant cover of each character. The first issue will be of our main protagonist, Aislinn Byrnes. These are only available through the campaign and will not be sold elsewhere after the campaign ends, so be sure to grab your copy and start collecting! 

 

Become a producer! You will be the heavy hitter of the funding for this issue. For that, you get more stickers, all the covers, a shirt with your name on it (I promise the shirt will look better than just a white box with your name on it), all packaged in a sick custom Herverity style box! Lastly, you will have a producer credit on the issue. 
(Disclaimer: Being an associate producer, does not give you the right to creative control over the series. It's just a title with some sweet swag!) 

 

If you're a comic book writer or even an upcoming one. Then you will most likely agree that making a comic is not the easiest thing to create. I often wanted to throw in the towel, to tell you the truth. I never even thought I would make it this far, but yet here I am. So you purchasing this comic and reading it is the biggest reward I could ever ask for. I hope you consider checking out my comic, and hopefully, one day, I will be able to check out yours!

 

With Covid still harassing the world, shipping might be an issue, but regarding the comic itself. I can proudly say you don't have to worry about a thing. The comic is finished, all the stickers and packaging is here ready to be shipped out. I just need the funds to print the book and get it in your hands. So long story short, you have nothing to worry about, you will receive what you ordered.

 

If you either can't afford to support or are looking for more ways to support your fellow indie comic creator, then I ask that you please share this campaign with all your friends and family!

story:
Blood Will Out is a horror western tale set in the Chronicles of Van Helsing world.  It stars Jeanie Marie, matriarch of the Van Helsing clan (and hero of issue one), as a young girl.  Following a string of cattle mutilations, Jeanie’s father, brothers, and local ranchers form a party to find out who has been feeding on their cattle.  They fear the source to be supernatural.  Jeanie, frustrated at being left behind and compelled by dreams and visions, sneaks out of her house and into the woods, armed with an old rifle and a machete.

Soon she encounters a pair of shape shifting were-creatures, and is forced to do battle against a much stronger foe.  Meanwhile, the hunting party has tracked a larger band of the creatures into an underground cavern, and is now trapped and outnumbered.

Blood Will Out is written and illustrated by Tony Morgan, cover artist for the Chronicles of Van Helsing series, as well as artist for Issue One.  It is based on characters created by Adam Watson.  It will be a 32 page issue comic with full color interiors.

While this is set in the Chronicles of Van Helsing world, it is a self contained one-shot that does not require any previous knowledge in order to enjoy.

Eighteen of thirty-two pages are currently completed.  Due to the time involved in hand painting each sequential page, we estimate that the project will be fully completed in April of 2020.  The printing process generally takes seven to fourteen days for printing and delivery.  We will be mailing all of the incentives out upon arrival of the books, starting in May of 2020.

Rewards

We have some fantastic rewards lined up for this campaign.  We have physical and digital editions of Blood Will Out available.  We have a comics pack that features all of the Chronicles of Van Helsing issues to date, a T-Shirt that features a brand new Chronicles of Van Helsing image by Tony Morgan and loads of original artwork

story:
WATCH THE FILMS IN THE GALLERY SECTION.


"HELP!" -  THE "TASTE OF LIFE" CROWD-FUNDING CAMPAIGN IS ALMOST OVER. THE FIRST WEB SERIES (we've heard of) ABOUT CROWD-FUNDING NEEDS YOU TO WATCH THESE FILMS AND CONTRIBUTE SO WE CAN MAKE A FEATURE FILM, "TASTE OF LIFE."

CONTRIBUTE ANYTHING YOU CAN AFFORD. SHOW YOUR SUPPORT!

QUESTION: Do you have a feature length screenplay?

ANSWER: Of course! The screenplay for "TASTE OF LIFE" is done. It's about a single Dad who meets online dates at the same restaurant that has stand-up comedy, music and dancing. Imagine a single location "Groundhog Day" dating "Annie Hall" on a "Slacker" budget. 

QUESTION: Why not talk about that? Why make these shorts? 

ANSWER: To make you laugh...To get you on our side and dramatize how epic, sometimes futile, running a crowd-funding campaign is. 

We're working SO hard... We need you to take action! Check the GALLERY for the shorts, "I Just Want To Make My Movie," "Skype Hell," "Fated To Pretend," "Edit," "Do It Now," "I Can't Go For That" and now, "HELP!"

FROM OUR WRITER/DIRECTOR, JOHN FRANCIS SULLIVAN 

"I've seen a lot of pitch videos by filmmakers looking for money to make their movies and thought it'd make fun of myself and this process. So, making a mini TV series about crowd-funding. If you like the shorts and laughed, please contribute. I identify with every filmmaker's plight... "I just want to make my movie." That's my mission and I NEED YOUR HELP!  

JOHN FRANCIS SULLIVAN, Writer/Director of SLEEPOVER and FOLLOW ME OUTSIDE, screenwriter of ENDLESS BUMMER, YESHUA, THE MISSING YEARS OF JESUS, BUSTER KEATON BIOPIC, NIKOLA TESLA BIOPIC and others is an NYU Film School graduate, accomplished filmmaker and proven creative talent. 

"After writing like twenty screenplays, some paid, some not, some specs (that means unpaid) and a few TV pilots, only ENDLESS BUMMER got made. I have too many scripts and wasn't satisfied with how ENDLESS BUMMER came out and had to ask, "Could I do any better?" Yes, I think I can. So I'm making a(nother) feature, "TASTE OF LIFE," to prove it. I put together a great team of collaborators with a simple goal: make a great movie that will change... EVERYTHING! 

First, we needed an idea that could be shot for very little money.  "TASTE OF LIFE" is that idea turned into a screenplay. Now we need money to make it.  Sound familiar? That's where you come in. Won't you contribute and forward the link?

TASTE OF LIFE is a funny, gut-wrenching story with a simple message: we all experience heartache and life is tough. You could lose your job, lose the love of your life, lose a body part... but life is also short, so you better enjoy it.  

Our goal is also simple: make people happy and laugh, sad and cry; feel and connect with the story and characters. We're confident that by end of this process we will accomplish these worthwhile and achievable goals."     

What We Need & What You Get:

It costs under 35K to make this film: locations, building and dressing sets, paying actors and crew, renting equipment and feeding everyone. Nothing will be wasted. 

You will receive PERKS but if you want something else, let us know! This is a two way street. Go for "The Heather Locklear" and contribute $2 and tell two friends so they tell two friends and so on, and so on... That's social networking the marketing dept. at Herbal Essences could have never dreamed about!

The Impact, Risks & Challenges:

There's no risk. Everyone who funds the movie, even for a couple bucks ($2), will get ASSOCIATE PRODUCER credit. You will enable a great film to get made that can touch potentially millions of lives, at least hundreds... And help a group of actors and crew to practice their craft for ridiculously low wages while you relax.  

You risk nothing and gain... EVERYTHING!  When you contribute, your money will be stretched further than what should be allowed by law. That said, we'll get signed contracts from everyone and make it all legal. The biggest challenge is to make a great film, and with your help to turn this into a CROWD-funded film -- WE WILL! 

Other Ways You Can Help:

We need cash, but if you are in LA and are an actor or crew person, reach out... But first make a contribution to help us reach our goal and -- SHARE THAT LINK!!!

THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

Our crowdfunding campaign is about raising funding to enable us to complete the second volume of Ninja Warrior. The first volume took us 4 years to complete! 
The story starts in the late 1500's with several villages around Kyoto. These villagers are abused by the samurai and also local warlords. When several families are slaughtered and several women are kidnapped, these farmers and fishermen unite and train to become deadly ninja assassins.

What We Need & What You Get

Rewards

$5 pledge gets you a twitter thank you.

$15 pledge gets you an ebook copy of the first volume of Ninja Warrior.

$25 pledge gets you three ebook graphic novels written by Fez McLeod.

$50 pledge gets you three ebook graphic novels and one crime fiction novel written by Fez McLeod.

$75 pledge gets you 4 ebooks and one page of artwork from our illustrators.

$100 VIP status. Your name is published in Volume 2 on a specific recognition page plus you also receive the 4 ebooks and a page of artwork from our illustrator.

$250 VIP Platinum. Your face is published in Volume 2 with your name and country underneath. You also receive the 4 ebooks and a page of artwork from our illustrator.

The Impact

The reason why it took 4 years to complete the first volume ws because we could only proceed with production when the money came available through personal earnings. Your support will enable us to get things done much faster with the second volume and that's why we're asking for your support!

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with others by telling as many people as you can! Thank you.
